data.title: Denver Nuggets Roster
data.meta_description: Denver Nuggets scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Draft Rights to Nene Hilario, the #7 pick in the First Round of the 2002 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Denver Nuggets from the New York Knicks on June 26, 2002. Nene Hilario signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 23, 2002. Nene Hilario re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on July 20, 2006.

Draft Rights to Linas Kleiza, the #27 pick in the First Round of the 2005 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Denver Nuggets from the Portland Trail Blazers on June 28, 2005. Linas Kleiza signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets on July 5, 2005.

Steve Blake was acquired in a trade by the Denver Nuggets from the Milwaukee Bucks on January 11, 2007.

Marcus Camby was acquired in a trade by the Denver Nuggets from the New York Knicks on June 26, 2002. Marcus Camby re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on July 16, 2004.

Allen Iverson was acquired in a trade by the Denver Nuggets from the Philadelphia Sixers on December 19, 2006.

Kenyon Martin was acquired in a sign and trade by the Denver Nuggets from the New Jersey Nets on July 15, 2004.

Eduardo Najera was acquired in a trade by the Denver Nuggets from the Golden State Warriors on February 24, 2005.

J.R. Smith was acquired in a trade by the Denver Nuggets from the Chicago Bulls on July 20, 2006.

Anthony Carter signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on April 13, 2007.

Yakhouba Diawara signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on July 26, 2006.

Reggie Evans signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on September 8, 2006.

DerMarr Johnson signed a contract with the Denver Nuggets on October 18, 2004. DerMarr Johnson re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on September 13, 2005. DerMarr Johnson re-signed to a contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on October 14, 2006.

Jamal Sampson signed a contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on July 28, 2006.

Von Wafer signed a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Denver Nuggets on April 13, 2007.
